ai-snp4.1:1.2_0: But if you succeeds in them,
ai-snp4.1:1.3_0: he is full of rapture, there is happiness,
ai-snp4.1:2.1_0: If you’re starting with sensual pleasures
ai-snp4.1:2.2_0: a person who has arisen for the one.
ai-snp4.1:2.3_0: Sensual pleasures have been given up.
ai-snp4.1:4.2_0: I’ll serve a slave of a bondservant.
ai-snp4.1:5.4_0: My ship was sweet as a prudent.
ai-snp4.1:6.1_0: Therefore those who are always mindful,
ai-snp4.1:6.4_0: like a ship crossing the far shore.
